content: BRUSSELS  Sept 25 The EU antitrust regulator will reach a decision on U.S. data centre operator Equinix Inc's  2.4-billion-pound ($3.7 billion) bid for British rival TelecityGroup by Oct.29  according to a filing on its website on Friday.
name: InterXion Holding NV
title: EU regulators to rule on $3.7 bln Equinix  Telecity deal by Oct. 29

content: LONDON/NEW YORK U.S. data center company Equinix Inc  said on Friday it would buy British peer TelecityGroup  in a deal worth 2.35 billion pounds ($3.6 billion) that would also end  Telecity's pursuit of a smaller European rival.
name: InterXion Holding NV
title: Equinix to buy TelecityGroup for $3.6 billion  Interxion deal ended

content: LONDON/NEW YORK  May 29 U.S. data center company Equinix Inc said on Friday it would buy British peer TelecityGroup in a deal worth 2.35 billion pounds ($3.6 billion) that would also end  Telecity's pursuit of a smaller European rival.
name: InterXion Holding NV
title: UPDATE 2-Equinix to buy TelecityGroup for $3.6 bln  Interxion deal ended

content: LONDON British data center provider Telecity Group Plc has opened talks on a possible 2.3 billion pound ($3.5 billion) takeover by Equinix Inc  throwing into doubt Telecity's deal to buy Interxion Holding NV agreed three months ago.
name: InterXion Holding NV
title: Equinix moves to gatecrash Telecity  Interxion deal

content: * Interxion repeats commitment to "strategically compelling" deal
name: InterXion Holding NV
title: UPDATE 3-Equinix moves to gatecrash Telecity  Interxion deal

content: LONDON  May 7 British data centre provider Telecity Group said it had decided to enter into takeover talks with Equinix almost three months after agreeing a non-binding $2.2 billion all-share deal to buy Interxion Holding NV.
name: InterXion Holding NV
title: Telecity  Interxion deal in doubt as Equinix weighs in

content: LONDON British data center provider Telecity Group Plc has agreed a non-binding $2.2 billion all-share deal to buy New York-listed Interxion Holding NV  looking to tap growing demand for "cloud" technology.
name: InterXion Holding NV
title: Telecity looks to 'cloud' growth with $2.2 billion Interxion deal

content: * Telecity shares up 16 pct   (Adds Telecity share reaction  earnings  details  background)
name: InterXion Holding NV
title: UPDATE 2-Telecity looks to "cloud" growth with $2.2 bln Interxion deal

content: LONDON  Feb 11 British data centre provider Telecity Group said on Wednesday it had reached a non-binding  all-share merger agreement with New York-listed Interxion.
name: InterXion Holding NV
title: Telecity  Interxion agree all-share merger
